## hpr3880 :: Installing a Google Nest Thermostat

 Our old thermostat was breaking down to the point that we could not
change the temperature, so it was time for a change. And since smart
thermostats have gotten pretty good I decided that I wanted to install
one and take more control of my environment.
Links:

https://www.consumerreports.org/smart-thermostats/google-nest-thermostat-review-a9480620820/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dHKD-9uI24I
https://www.electronicshub.org/thermostat-wire-colors/
https://support.google.com/googlenest/answer/9452748?hl=en#zippy=%2Ccommon-thermostat-wires
https://www.palain.com/miscellaneous-technical-notes/installing-a-google-nest-thermostat/
